name: Greatest Psionic
description:
Gather your team of heroes, equip found artifacts and plunge into the world of magic. Psionic abilities and a good luck are your weapons. Open spheres in search of treasure chests and items unique to each aspect, avoiding deadly traps. Create your own unique set of artifacts & try your luck, improving them.

Game features:

  • simple gameplay
  • short game sessions
  • game without internet connection
  • free chests
  • hardcore artifact enhancement
  • combinable artifacts
